headline: Solstice Weighs UF6 Growth Plans Against New Dividend And Cash Risks
summary: Solstice Advanced Materials (NasdaqGS:SOLS) plans a 20% expansion of its UF6 nuclear conversion capacity targeted for 2026. The company has also introduced its first quarterly dividend, marking a new approach to capital returns. These moves come as nuclear energy demand is described as rising, with Solstice aiming to adjust its operations and capital allocation accordingly. For investors watching nuclear fuel supply, Solstice Advanced Materials sits in a focused corner of the market, with...
